Text.Page:
To the shame of the federation, guildmasters from around the world of TERA formed three alliances to take control. Which reflects your philosophy?

The material desires of the Free Traders Collective? The fellowship of the Enlightened Union? Or the battle stance of the Iron Order?
Only guildmasters can select a guild's alliance.

The federation hasn't kept its promises. There is a movement afoot to change how the power is weilded.

But you didn't hear it from me, of course.
